snippet: Lawyers for George Zimmerman, who is charged with second-degree murder in the killing of Trayvon Martin, said they would seek a hearing under the “Stand Your Ground” self-defense law.
abstract: Lawyers for George Zimmerman, the neighborhood watch volunteer charged with second-degree murder in the killing of Trayvon Martin, will seek a hearing under the Stand Your Ground self-defense law that could result in the dismissal of the criminal charges.
lead_paragraph: Lawyers for George Zimmerman, who is charged with second-degree murder in the killing of Trayvon Martin, said they would seek a hearing under the “Stand Your Ground” self-defense law.

headline.seo: Florida: Lawyers for George Zimmerman to Invoke ‘Stand Your Ground’
headline.main: Florida: Zimmerman to Invoke ‘Stand Your Ground’
headline.print_headline: Florida: Zimmerman To Invoke ‘Stand Your Ground’
